virtual Bool HavokPhysicsTask::IsPrimaryThreadOnly ( void   )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Implementation of the ISystemTask::IsPrimaryThreadOnly function. This function returns False for HavokPhysicsTask. HavokPhysicsTask does not need to run only on the primary thread.

Returns:
Bool - Returns if this system should only run on the primary thread.
